Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object

 @SessionAttributes(value="customer")
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object

      • processNewCustomer

        @RequestMapping(value="/newcustomer",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String processNewCustomer(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                              Customer customer,
                                                                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                              org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map)
        HTTP POST request handler for /newcustomer to respond to the new customer form POST
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer object currently in session representing the new customer
        result - the BindingResult from the validation of the form fields of Customer
        map - the current ModelMap
        Returns:
        the jsp to return based on the logic of the method (if all is well, redirect to login)

      • processLoginScreen

        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String processLoginScreen(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                        Customer customer,
                                                                                                        @ModelAttribute(value="loginform")
                                                                                                        LoginForm loginform,
                                                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult br,
                                                                                                        org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map)
        HTTP POST handler for the main login page
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer object of the customer logging in
        loginform - the LoginForm object for validation checking
        br - the BindingResult object for errors in the LoginForm object
        map - the ModelMap
        Returns:
        the jsp page (customer dashboard if successfully logged in)

      • showLogoutScreen

        @RequestMapping(value="/logout",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String showLogoutScreen(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                      Customer customer,
                                                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                      org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map)
        HTTP GET handler for a customer logout. Sets all model and session attributes to null
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer object currently in session
        session - the current HTTP session
        map - the ModelMap
        Returns:
        a redirecrt to the login page

      • processDeposit

        @RequestMapping(value="/deposit-bank",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String processDeposit(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                           Customer customer,
                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="account")
                                                                                                           java.lang.String accountType,
                                                                                                           @ModelAttribute(value="amount")
                                                                                                           AmountForm amountStr,
                                                                                                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult br,
                                                                                                           org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map)
        HTTP POST handler for processing the deposit form
        Parameters:
        customer - the current logged-in Customer object
        accountType - the account type from the radio button ("chk", "sav", or "loan")
        amountStr - a String representation of the deposit amount that will be converted to double if possible
        br - the BindingResult object for the AmountForm object
        map - the ModelMap
        Returns:
        the jsp file name to go to depending on the result

      • processWithdrawal

        @RequestMapping(value="/withdraw-bank",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String processWithdrawal(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                               Customer customer,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="account")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String accountType,
                                                                                                               @ModelAttribute(value="amount")
                                                                                                               AmountForm amountStr,
                                                                                                               org.springframework.validation.BindingResult br,
                                                                                                               org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map)
        HTTP POST request handler for withdrawals
        Parameters:
        customer - the current logged-in Customer object
        accountType - the account type ("chk", "sav", or "loan")
        amountStr - the String representation of the withdrawal amount that will be converted to double, if possible
        br - the BindingResult object for the AmountForm
        map - the ModelMap
        Returns:
        the jsp to access (dashboard if the transaction is valid)

      • processTransfer

        @RequestMapping(value="/transfer-bank",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String processTransfer(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                             Customer customer,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="fromaccount")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String fromAccount,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="toaccount")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String toAccount,
                                                                                                             @ModelAttribute(value="amount")
                                                                                                             AmountForm amountStr,
                                                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult br,
                                                                                                             org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map)
        HTTP POST handler for transfers between accounts
        Parameters:
        customer - the current logged-in Customer object
        fromAccount - the account type FROM ("chk", "sav", or "loan")
        toAccount - the account type FROM ("chk", "sav", or "loan")
        amountStr - the String representation of the transfer amount that will be converted to double, if possible
        br - the BindingResult object for the AmountForm
        map - the ModelMap
        Returns:
        the jsp to access (dashboard if successful)

      • processTransferCheckingOverdraft

        @RequestMapping(value="/transfer-bank-error-checking",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String processTransferCheckingOverdraft(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                                                             Customer customer,
                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="amount")
                                                                                                                                             double amount,
                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="toAccount")
                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String toAccount,
                                                                                                                                             org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map)
        HTTP POST handler for transfer-out-of-checking errors. Performs the transfer that has been validated by this point
        Parameters:
        customer - the current logged-in Customer object
        amount - the amount of the transfer
        toAccount - the account type TO ("chk", "sav", or "loan")
        map - the ModelMap
        Returns:
        the jsp to access (dashboard if successful)

                                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map)
        HTTP GET handler for generating bank statements. Access all transactions for the logged-in customer and separates them into lists by account type.
        Parameters:
        customer - the current logged-in Customer object
        map - the ModelMap
        Returns:
        the jsp to access (statements-bank if successful)
